mapper.select:
select * from ( select questionId,question, subject, score, section, level, '选择题' as type from multi_question union select questionId,question, subject, score, section, level, '判断题' as type from judge_question union select questionId,question, subject, score, section, level, '填空题' as type from fill_question ) t where 1=1
and t.type = #{params.type}
and t.question like concat('%',#{params.question},'%')
and t.subject like concat('%',#{params.subject},'%')
order by t.questionId desc
